headline: Applovin Corp (APP) Divests Gaming Subsidiaries in $400M Tripledot Deal
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the best AI stocks to buy, according to billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller. On July 1, AppLovin Corporation announced the successful sale of its mobile gaming subsidiaries to Tripledot Group Holdings and its affiliates, with the deal officially closing on June 30, 2025. The sale included $400 million in cash—paid directly […]

headline: Wurl and TVision Unveil New Report Linking Emotion Alignment to Higher Ad Attention on Streaming TV
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., July 31, 2025--Wurl, a leader in the streaming TV industry, in partnership with TVision, the company measuring every second of TV and CTV viewer engagement, published a new report today called, The Impact of Emotion Alignment on Ad Attention in Streaming TV. The report offers a first-of-its-kind analysis across 50+ advertiser campaigns to explore how emotional alignment between ads and on-screen content can boost attention on streaming TV.

headline: Roblox Q2 Earnings Beat Sends Leveraged RBLU Soaring
summary: - The leveraged RBLU fund surged nearly 25% following the gaming platform's earnings beat. - Strong bookings growth of 51% drove gains across gaming and Web3 ETFs. - User growth of 41% and raised guidance are boosting investor confidence.
